[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SignRoundInfo::public_nonces] [Nonce Reuse] Does using BTreeMap by signer_id prevent multiple nonces per signer, or can attacker send multiple? High severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SignRoundInfo::nonce_recv_key_ids] [Duplicate Keys] Can nonce_recv_key_ids contain duplicates, allowing double-counting of keys toward threshold? Critical severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SignRoundInfo::sign_recv_key_ids] [Set Confusion] Are nonce_recv_key_ids and sign_recv_key_ids required to match, or can signers send nonces but not signatures? High severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SignRoundInfo::sign_wait_signer_ids] [Timeout Tracking] Does sign_wait_signer_ids get updated correctly if a signer is marked malicious mid-round? High severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SignRoundInfo] [Memory Exhaustion] Can attacker cause SignRoundInfo to grow unbounded by starting many signing rounds without completing them? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SavedState::config] [Key Exposure] Does SavedState serialize message_private_key, potentially exposing it in logs or backups? Critical severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SavedState::party_polynomials] [Polynomial Validation] When loading SavedState, are party_polynomials re-validated against aggregate_public_key? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SavedState::current_dkg_id] [Rollback Attack] Can attacker rollback current_dkg_id to replay old DKG rounds? Critical severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SavedState::current_sign_id] [ID Monotonicity] Is there enforcement that loaded sign_id >= previous sign_id to prevent replay? High severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SavedState::dkg_public_shares] [Partial State] Can SavedState represent inconsistent state where dkg_public_shares exist but dkg_private_shares don't? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SavedState::message_nonces] [BTreeMap Key] Using Vec<u8> as BTreeMap key for messages - can hash collisions cause signature confusion? High severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SavedState::malicious_signer_ids] [Persistence] Are malicious_signer_ids persisted across restarts to prevent previously-banned signers from rejoining? High severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SavedState::malicious_dkg_signer_ids] [Separate Tracking] Why are DKG and signing malicious signers tracked separately - can this cause inconsistency? Medium severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SavedState::state] [State Validation] When loading SavedState with non-Idle state, are required fields validated (e.g., aggregate_key for signing states)? High severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SavedState timing fields] [Instant Serialization] Are Instant values (nonce_start, dkg_public_start, etc.) serializable across process restarts? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator::new()] [Initialization] Does new() ensure coordinator starts in valid state with no partially-initialized fields? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator::load()] [State Validation] Does load() validate SavedState consistency before restoring coordinator? Critical severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator::save()] [Atomicity] Is save() atomic, preventing corruption if process crashes mid-save? Medium severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator::set_key_and_party_polynomials()] [Polynomial Verification] Does this method verify polynomial commitments match the aggregate key before accepting? Critical severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator::process()] [Timeout Ordering] Does process() check timeouts before processing packet, or can stale packets be processed after timeout? High severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator::start_dkg_round()] [ID Generation] If dkg_id is None, does start_dkg_round use wrapping_add, and is overflow handled safely? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator::start_signing_round()] [Precondition] Does start_signing_round verify aggregate_public_key exists before starting? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator::reset()] [Incomplete Reset] Does reset() clear all sensitive state including cached signatures and malicious signer lists? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Generic Bounds] Are trait bounds sufficient to prevent unsafe Aggregator implementations? Medium severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator::get_config_mut()] [Test-Only Mutation] Is get_config_mut() truly test-only, or can it be used to modify config during active protocol? High severity.
